name: Playing games
description: I like playing a few games under different genres.

name: Reading Books
description: I read the odd book once in a while.

name: Small Programming Projects
description: If I have free time I often like to try new programming languages and ideas that I have.

name: Triathlon Training
description: I like all sport and therefore have become very interested in multisport activities such as triathlons. I like set small goals in each triathlon sport and often train at least two disciplines a week.

name: Watching Movies
description: I like watching movies from time to time.
